>Construction of pLYC5
acquire oligo olyc5				
acquire oligo olyc1
acquire oligo olyc1r
acquire oligo olyc5r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc5,olyc1r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA5)
PCR olyc1,olyc5r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB5)
Assemble pcrA5,pcrB5	(Gibson, pLYC5)
Transform pLYC5	(Mach1, Amp)
